item.title: Coding Blog Plugin | Article Cards
item.content:encoded: It is a common thing to reference your other blog posts in a particular blog post. For example you might want to highlight your latest blog posts on your blog's first page. ...
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh Khoub)

item.title: Coding Blog Plugin | Author Information
item.content:encoded: You can easily provide author and publishing (latest publish date) information using Author markdown component: ...
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh Khoub)

item.title: Coding Blog Plugin | Assets
item.content:encoded: If you want to host your own static assets (images, stylesheets, scripts, etc) and reference them in your blog posts, you need to tell coding.blog's build pipeline to pull them from your repo and put them alongside the rest of your content on the CDNs. ...
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh Khoub)

item.title: Coding Blog Plugin | Hero Images
item.content:encoded: Hero images help you quickly establish the general mood of your blog post. You can add them to your posts using Hero markdown component: ...
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh Khoub)

item.title: Coding Blog Plugin
item.description: A CODEDOC plugin for blogging. Write elegant blogs on programming using Markdown, host on GitHub Pages or coding.blog or any CDN.
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh Khoub)

item.title: Coding Blog Plugin | Miscellaneous Components
item.content:encoded: The Big component allows you to write bigger texts than usual (that are not titles): ...
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh Khoub)

item.title: Coding Blog Plugin | Title
item.content:encoded: The Title component is useful for the title of the page. It will be shown in a prominent manner, will be picked up by CODEDOC's automatic title guessing mechanism, but will not show-up in the content navigation list: ...
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh Khoub)
